channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SCM HttpClient Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins SCM HttpClient Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-41249|2024-08-03T12:35:49.618Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scm%20httpclient%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Jenkins SCM HttpClient Plugin 1.5 and earlier allows attackers to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.

item.title: CVE-2022-41250|2024-08-03T12:35:49.674Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20scm%20httpclient%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins SCM HttpClient Plugin 1.5 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to connect to an attacker-specified HTTP server using attacker-specified credentials IDs obtained through another method, capturing credentials stored in Jenkins.
